EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Payment Notification for Kevin McCarron (20841) (1341940414.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Payment Notification for Kevin McCarron (20841) (1341940414.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kevin, Pre-note is just when ADP makes sure your bank account info is accurate by putting in a deposit of 0 and making sure it goes through. This will not be an issue for you as it usually done within in a week of becoming active with MBO. You are all set to get these funds paid out on Friday. Thanks!Sara From: Kevin McCarron [mailto:projects@kevinmccarron.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 10, 2012 12:30 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Payment Notification for Kevin McCarron (20841) Thanks, Sara.
What is the 'pre-note' process? I was just looking at the Direct Deposit settings and saw this.
Are there any final edits that need to be made in order for payroll to post this Friday?
Kevin On Tue, Jul 10, 2012 at 12:05 PM, <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:We received the following payment(s) today, 07/10/2012 on your behalf:2,673.00 Fee The Weather Channel - McCarron - Invoice: 371248 - May 21, 2012 - May 25, 2012
Sincerely, The MBO Partners Billing/AR Department
-- Kevin McCarron Founder, Designer & Strategist
Projection Creative | m 404.697.4470 <http://404.697.4470> | kevinmccarron.com <http://kevinmccarron.com>
